meanings.definition: A substance used to stimulate the production of antibodies and provide immunity against one or several diseases.
meanings.sent1: Vaccines help our bodies fight off sickness.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend getting vaccines to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The vaccines lined up like soldiers ready to protect us.
meanings.sent4: Her immunity was a fortress built by vaccines.
meanings.sent5: The vaccines acted as shields, guarding against illness.

meanings.definition: A preparation of killed or weakened pathogens introduced into the body to produce immunity.
meanings.sent1: We received vaccines to build our defenses.
meanings.sent2: The vaccines contained weakened germs to make us stronger.
meanings.sent3: The vaccines threw a party in our bodies to train our immune system.
meanings.sent4: His body was a battleground where vaccines fought off invaders.
meanings.sent5: The vaccines were like teachers, educating our immune system.
